home.title: Home
home.description: StickShop is an online retailer of sticks. We offer a wide range of sticks to suit all tastes. Feel free to browse our shop to find the stick that's right for you !

map.title: Map of our suppliers
map.description: Our sticks are carefully selected from the world's most prestigious forests, guaranteeing a natural and authentic origin. Explore our collection and discover the fascinating stories behind each stick, from the lush forests of North America, the mystical woods of Europe, to the exotic jungles of Asia. Click on the map to find out more about the origins of our products and let yourself be transported by the magic of exceptional woods.

forests.forest1: Fontainebleau Forest: Oaks, pines and birches
forests.forest2: Mount Rainier National Park: Firs, spruces and hemlocks
forests.forest3: Caledonian Forest: Scots pines and birches
forests.forest4: Brasília National Park: Cerrado (tropical trees and shrubs)
forests.forest5: Åland Island Forest: Pines and spruces
forests.forest6: Chapultepec Forest: Pines, oaks and cedars
forests.forest8: Yosemite National Park: Sequoias, pines and oaks
forests.forest9: Castel Fusano Forest: Umbrella pines and holm oaks
forests.forest10: Thetford Forest: Scots pines and oaks
forests.forest11: Nyungwe Forest: Tropical rainforest (mahoganies, ebonies and rubbers)
forests.forest12: Tarkine Forest: Temperate rainforest (myrtles and eucalyptus)
forests.forest13: Hoia Forest: Oaks, beeches and ashes
forests.forest14: Chouf Forest: Oaks, cedars and pines
forests.forest15: Black Forest: Firs, spruces and pines
forests.forest17: Sherbrooke Forest: Eucalyptus and tree ferns
forests.forest18: Jerusalem Forest: Aleppo pines, cypresses and oaks
forests.forest20: Nuuksio National Park: Pines, spruces and birches

video.title: One of our suppliers
video.description: Discover one of our suppliers, located in Ariège, France, who is passionate about walking sticks. In this interview with La dépêche du midi, he shares his passion for sticks and explains how he makes them.

orderValidation.title: Order validation
orderValidation.message: Please check your order information before confirming it

orderSuccess.title: Order success
orderSuccess.message: Your order has been successfully placed. Thank you for your purchase !

contactForm.description: If you have any questions or would like more information, please contact us using the form below.
